**FishMIP 2022 International Workshop, St John's, Newfoundland Canada and online**

![](images/stjohnspic.png)

The workshop was co-funded by the [SOMBEE](http://sombee.org/){target="_blank"} project, The Fisheries and Marine Institute of memorial University of Newfoundland and The Institute for Marine and Antarctic Studies, University of Tasmania. We supported travel for seven Early Career Researchers were supported to attend this meeting.

Full programme including abstracts [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-qx-44lATN-yIOHd86kjvFIfKFZXp9bb/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=116794278928838702705&rtpof=true&sd=true){target="_blank"}.

Access to slides and recordings are available on request.
